SEARCH

Class HomepageControllerTest

java.lang.Object
HomepageControllerTest
public class HomepageControllerTest extends Object
Integration tests for the homepageController class.

This class utilizes Java Reflection to access private fields and methods within the controller, allowing for comprehensive white-box testing of UI logic, data persistence, and validation rules without relying on the full JavaFX application lifecycle.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Zainab

    Cleans up resources after each test execution.
    (package private) void
    testGetUserEmail_FoundAndEmpty()
    Tests getUserEmail for an existing user and for an unknown user.
    (package private) void
    testGetUserMembership_FoundAndDefault()
    Tests getUserMembership for an existing user and for default Silver when not found.
    (package private) void
    testHandleAddBook_CD_Logic()
    Verifies that selecting 'CD' from the combo box correctly creates a CD object instance.
    (package private) void
    testHandleAddBook_Conflict_ISBN()
    Tests that adding a book with an existing ISBN but different author/title is rejected to prevent data conflicts.
    (package private) void
    testHandleAddBook_EmptyFields()
    Tests that attempting to add a book with empty fields triggers an error message.
    (package private) void
    testHandleAddBook_Success_And_NewCopy()
    Tests the successful addition of a new book and the creation of a new copy when a book with the same ISBN is added.
    (package private) void
    testHandleDeleteUser_NoSelection()
    Tests the delete user functionality when no user is selected.
    (package private) void
    testHandleDeleteUser_Success()
    Verifies the successful deletion of a user who has no active loans.
    (package private) void
    testHandleDeleteUser_WithLoans()
    Verifies that a user cannot be deleted if they have active loans.
    (package private) void
    testHandleReload_And_LoadFromFile()
    Tests the persistence loading mechanism by writing dummy data to a file and triggering a reload to verify data parsing.
    (package private) void
    testHandleReload_SetsReloadMessage()
    Tests that handleReload also sets the reload message.
    (package private) void
    testHandleSearch_AllModes()
    Tests the search functionality across all modes (Title, Author, ISBN) and ensures filtering logic works as expected.
    (package private) void
    testHandleSendReminder_SuccessPath()
    Verifies the success path of handleSendReminder: user has an email AND at least one overdue item, while stubbing the real email sending via subscribers list.
    (package private) void
    testRowFactory_Coloring()
    Verifies that the TableView RowFactory correctly styles rows based on media status.
    (package private) void
    testSendReminder_Validation()
    Tests the validation logic for sending overdue reminders, covering cases like missing emails or users with no overdue items.
    (package private) void
    testSetCurrentUsername()
    Verifies that the welcome label correctly updates with the provided username.
    (package private) void
    testShowAlert_NonFxThread_DoesNotThrow()
    Tests that showAlert can be invoked off the FX thread (test mode branch).

      private homepageController controller

  • Constructor Details

    • HomepageControllerTest

      public HomepageControllerTest()

  • Method Details

    • initToolkit

      @BeforeAll static void initToolkit()
      Initializes the JavaFX toolkit environment. This is required to instantiate JavaFX controls like Labels and TableViews outside of a standard Application start method.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test execution.

      This method initializes the controller, injects mock UI components using reflection, and clears any existing data files to ensure test isolation.

      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection access fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown() throws IOException
      Cleans up resources after each test execution. Deletes temporary files created during testing.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file deletion fails.

    • injectField

      private void injectField(String name, Object value) throws Exception
      Injects a value into a private field of the controller using reflection.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the field.
      value - the value to inject.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the field cannot be accessed.

    • getPrivateField

      private Object getPrivateField(String name) throws Exception
      Retrieves the value of a private field from the controller using reflection.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the field.
      Returns:
      the value of the field.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the field cannot be accessed.

    • testRowFactory_Coloring

      @Test void testRowFactory_Coloring() throws Exception
      Verifies that the TableView RowFactory correctly styles rows based on media status. Checks logic for 'Available', 'Borrowed', and 'Overdue' statuses.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or method invocation fails.
